Reasons to Go Outside

A mobile prototype for peer-to-peer sharing of locally grown food.

Project:

Some good friends took it upon themselves to visit every park in Seattle, WA. It turns out there are a lot of them, and when they finished they made a lovely book documenting their experience.

Lola Migas, who designed the book, mocked up an accompanying website that I agreed to build. I used Bootstrap for the layout and PayPal for the e-commerce.

Tools used:

  • Sublime Text
  • Bootstrap
  • JQuery
  • Paypal

The website can be viewed live at reasonstogooutside.com.
